abstract: Orian Almog and Joanne Yun joined Media6Degrees, New York, in new posts.
snippet: Orian Almog and Joanne Yun joined Media6Degrees, New York, in new posts.
lead_paragraph: Orian Almog and Joanne Yun joined Media6Degrees, New York, in new posts. Ms. Almog becomes an account executive; she had been a director at Cognitive Match, New York. Ms. Yun becomes director for sales strategy and operations; she had held various posts at the New York office of Google.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
